parameters:
    env: #env
    baseurl: #baseurl
    basetitle: #basetitle
    controllerdefault: #controllerdefault
    
    database:
        dev:
            host: #host
            port: #port
            dbname: #dbname
            dbuser: #dbuser
            dbpass: #dbpass
        prod:
            host: #phost
            port: #pport
            dbname: #pdbname
            dbuser: #pdbuser
            dbpass: #pdbpass
            
    
    roles:
        user: *
        admin: admin
